reviews.comments:
Es un edificio muy tranquilo y con seguridad, lo cual es importante.
El dpto es muy cómodo y bien equipado.
departamento muy recomendable ! y marcos muy buen anfitrión! gracias X todo !
Excelente apartamento! Me hospedo en los departamentos de Marcos cada vez que viajo a Buenos Aires por trabajo.  Siempre la mejor atencion, super limpios y excelente decoracion. Gracias una vez mas

Bellisimo departamento!!!! :)  Cada vez que viajo a Buenos Aires me hospedo en el departamento de Marcos. Lo elijo por su excelente ubicacion y comodidad.  El personal de seguridad del edificio es mi amable y el departamento es bellisimo.

Estoy seguro que no va a ser para nada fácil encontrar un lugar en el que te hagan sentir tan comodo y a gusto como con Marcos, el anfitrión y los encargados de la seguridad del edificio son tan atentos y respetuosos como en un four seasons o cualquier otro hotel de lujo que se venga a la mente. Las instalaciones y comodidades del departamento son increibles, no falta nada y dan libertad para poder planear un viaje de la forma más conveniente. La ubicación es de lo mejor!! En frente y a la vuelta tiene supermecado, los restaurantes a la redonda invitan a no agarrar el auto para nada y la seguridad es muy destacable, siempre en la esquina hay un policia de la metropolitana y en la semana que estuvimos no nos cruzamos ni sentimos con ninguna situación que nos haga extrañar la seguridad de carlos paz. Maravillosa experiencia la que nos han brindado y Marcos va a estar para asistir en absolutamente todo lo que necesiten!! Espero que en mi próximo viaje este libre y podamos alojarnos otra vez :D MUCHÍSIMAS GRACIAS!
Super recomendable, increible ubicación. No duden en hospedarse aqui.

El dpto de Marcos está muy bueno, muy recomendable. Todo estuvo OK, conforme a lo ofrecido. Está bien equipado para una estadía. Tiene seguridad 24 hs, ubicado en una zona con muchas alternativas de gastronomia y comerciales. Quedamos muy conformes
El departamento es muy cómodo y luminoso, la atención del Marcos fue muy buena y agradable y tiene una ubicación excelente para poder disfrutar de día y de noche. Gracias

Excelente ubicación! El mejor lugar de Buenos Aires. El departamento completo es excelente! Y Marcos estuvo pendiente de todos los detalles de nuestra llegada y todo lo referido al departamento! Sin dudas que volveremos!

El departamento es muy cómodo , impecablemente limpio, tal cual se ve en las fotos o quizá mejor aún. Marcos  fue muy atento y siempre preguntaba si necesitaba alguna cosa. La ubicacion es muy buena y muy practica por que esta Cerca de buenos restaurant es.    Un detalle importante es la Guardia permanente en el Edificio lo q te hace sentir muy protegido. En sintesis un lugar para calificar con un "10"

reviewer.first_name: Hugo M. Pesa Y Cia S.R.L.
reviewer.host_name: Hugo M. Pesa Y Cia S.R.L.

reviews.comments: Departamento lindo, moderno y comodo. La ubicacion es excelente, tanto por el barrio con bares, restos, tiendas, como por la comunicación por transporte público con cualquier parte de la ciudad. Fuimos en familia y volveríamos sin dudarlo.
Fuimos con mi novia a Palermo, paramos en el departamento de Marcos, nos sentimos muy cómodos, mejor que en casa!
La estadía fue excelente . El dpto tal como se ve en las fotos . Muy lindo , limpio agradable . La ubicación es muy buena  . Edificio con mucho control en seguridad . Muy recomendable.

reviewer.first_name: Hugo M. Pesa Y Cia S.R.L.
reviewer.host_name: Hugo M. Pesa Y Cia S.R.L.

reviews.comments:
Nos alojamos en el departamento de Marcos y nos encanto. Tal y como se lo ve en las imágenes es espacioso, moderno, muy bien decorado y responde a todas las necesidades. La pileta, el sauna y el gimnasio están en los últimos pisos y otorgan una vista fotográfica de la ciudad. El personal del edificio es muy cordial. Palermo Hollywood es de lo mas lindo de Buenos Aires, es un barrio tranquilo, queda cerca de muchos lugares turísticos con líneas de tren y colectivo con las que se puede ir a cualquier lugar de la ciudad y cerca de avenidas principales si se anda en auto.
Un párrafo aparte merece la atención de Marcos que si bien no pudimos conocer en persona estuvo en contacto eléctronico permanente y hasta nos envio sugerencias sobre lugares de interés, bares, restaurant, etc, que fueron muy practicas para nuestras salidas.
Muy muy recomendable!!!

Excelente el departamento, la ubicación. nos sentimos como en casa.
Cumple lo anunciado. Muy bien equipado. Excelente vista.

Si desean una estancia con dos habitaciones y baños separados no busquen más, este el sitio. Excelente barrio, rodeado de bares, restaurantes y paseos. Subte a 5 cuadras con lo que se llega a cualquier sitio de la ciudad en un máximo de 25 minutos. Apartamento coqueto, cómodo y moderno. Atencion del host inmejorable. Les recomiendo que no busquen mas y lo reserven ahora. Excelente.

Buen lugar para recorrer una zona muy turística en Buenos Aires, Marcos siempre atento a resolver nuestras dudas y con detalles cordiales. Algunas cosas a mejorar en relación a los servicios higiénicos. Recomendable!
Marcos es un excelente anfitrión, en todo momento atento a nosotros y nuestras necesidades. La ubicación del apartamento era exactamente lo que buscábamos .

El apartamento es tal cual se muestra en las fotos. Muy cómodo, agradable, iluminado y con todo lo necesario. La ubicación es excelente.
Buen wifi y cable; excelentes baños y camas muy cómodas.
Absolutamente recomendable.

Marcos es un top anfitrion, discreto pero muy atento y reactivo. Su departamento es una super opción para quedarse en el corazón de una de las mejores partes de Palermo, con muchos lugares interesante a una distancia cómoda, para caminar a pie. Altamente recomendable. Pasé unos magníficos días, y no dudaría en regresar. Lo recomiendo ampliamente.
El apto está muy bien ubicado, es muy agradable y lindo!!!
Muy buena ubicación con todas la necesidades y lujos que puedas encontrar. El lugar es seguro y con accesos rápidos a toda o ciudad. Zona de bares y pubs.

Es difícil decir algo más que no se haya dicho de este apartamento y de Marcos como anfitrión. El lugar queda muy cerca a varias atracciones de Palermo, restaurantes, bares, cafés, compras y de todo. Muy cercano también a parques, transporte público y vías principales de tránsito. Tanto Marcos como los porteros son muy atentos. La comunicación con Marcos fue excelente y él estuvo en contacto con nosotros desde la reserva, con anticipación de nuestra llegada y durante nuestra visita. Todo estuvo genial, pero algo en que relució Marcos fue con sus recomendaciones de restaurantes cercanos. Fuimos a varios que él recomendó y todos fueron un éxito. Definitivamente recomendamos a este departamento y a Marcos. No dudaríamos en volver.

Súper agradable apartamento, luminoso, seguro y silencioso lo que permite un placentero descanso.
Ubicado en una concentrada zona Gourmet que evita  grandes desplazamientos para encontrar las mejores opciones.
Lo recomiendo y pienso regresar!

El apartamento es bonito, bien equipado y limpio. Es un plus que tenga dos baños. Queda en un sector muy agradable y seguro, hay muchos restaurantes y bares y muy cerca del subte, aunque los taxis no son demasiado caros en Buenos Aires. Lo recomiendo muchísimo.

Obvio que no me sentí como en casa. Pero eso no es por causa de Marcos ni tiene que ver con el departamento. Me sentí muy cómodo, el departamento es limpio, nuevo, tiene muy buena vajilla, aire acondicionado y calefacción, un buen baño... Todo bien
Apartamento muy bonito y muy bien situado. Yo recomiendo
Buena ubicación, lindo barrio y el departamento tal cual a las fotos. Recomendado!

Muy bien ubicado y el edificio es nuevo, toda la gente que trabaja en el edificio súper amable y siempre con ganas de ayudar. Buena atención de Marcos, nos hizo favor de prestar una licuadora y la llevo al departamento, muy recomendable!
El apartamento muy limpio , excelente ubicación, y Marcos siempre dispuesto a atender cualquier inquietud. Satisfacción total.
Nos alojamos en mayo. El apartamento es muy luminoso y cómodo. El barrio es muy lindo y esta cerca de muchos lugares para almorzar o cenar. Me volvería a hospedar.
Magnífico departamento. El tamaño ideal para pasarte unas estupendas vacaciones con tu familia. Y la ubicación inmejorable. 100% recomendable.

Marcos fue un muy buen anfitrión, desde antes de llegar, enviando recomendaciones, y durante nuestra estancia respondiendo nuestras consultas de inmediato. El apartamento es tal cual las fotos, está muy bien ubicado, es cómodo, y está bien equipado. Nos alojamos 3 noches con otro matrimonio amigo. Volveríamos a alojarnos en este lugar.
Muy buena ubicación, Marcos fue muy atento en todo momento.  Como sugerencia, falta un poco de mantenimiento en el mismo.
Excelente departamento, instalaciones,  barrio, todo. completamente seguro, muy buena comunicación y coordinacion, totalmente recomendable y espero volver algún día.

Excellent apartment exactly as shown in the photos. Perfect location with hundreds of amazing restaurants, cafes and bards walking distance.  The supermarket is exactly in front, the terrace has amazing views of the city. The apartment was very clean and beautifully decorated.  Marcus even left us a present on our arrival.  Amazing host, highly recommend it.
Great host

The apartment is extremely well located, right in the heart of Palermo Hollywood. Everything is exactly as you see on the photos - clean, spacious and well equipped. The building is great, with security, an amazing pool and terrace with views of the city and a gym. Definitely recommend it as a place to stay in Palermo, and Marcos was very helpful in providing recommendations and in allowing us to check in early. Thanks also for the map and the restaurant recommendations! Our parents loved their stay, and had no complaints whatsoever.

We loved this apartment.  It's a beautiful home, tastefully decorated, comfortable with lots of windows.  As we were a group of 4.5 people, the 2 full baths and portable crib were appreciated.  The building feels very secure, the neighborhood was great too.  Marcos was a great host, very friendly, giving lots of recommendations of where to eat and things to do.  Everything exceeded our expectations. Would stay here again in a heartbeat.  Thanks Marcos! Max

Great location, lovely clean and good sized apartment.  Loved the pool and fitness center.  You cannot beat the location for restaurants and bars.  Marcos was easy to communicate with and the check in super easy.  Definitely would stay again.

Amazing apartment in the best location of Palermo.  The place was super clean and very nicely decorated. WIFI worked very well.  Having a supermarket across the street in a big plus. The front desk staff was very friendly and helpful.  Amazing deal
Awesome place. AMAZING deal

Marcos' place is in a great location!!  Easy walking distance to everything in Palermo Soho and Palermo Hollywood.  The doormen were friendly and helped us store our luggage on the last day.  The building was safe and clean.  Marcos was a very responsive host and provided us a TON of recommendations.  I highly recommend Marcos' place.

My family and I stayed at Marcos’s place for a week. Location is great, close to great restaurants and bars (there’s also a small supermarket right across the street, which is super helpful). The apartment has amazing water pressure, and is very comfortable. 
Marcos is a great host. There was an issue with the internet provider, and Marcos was very responsive.

Myself and a small group of friends were returning from a mountaineering trip in Patagonia and booked Marco's place in Buenos Aires to recuperate and explore Buenos Aires. The apartment was great and the bedrooms were exactly what we needed. The only note I would like to make is Marco's attention to his guesses. The AC unit in the apartment broke down before our arrival and due to repairs Marco made sure to book us another place for the first night and made sure that his place was clean and ready for us after the repairs were done. The whole time he was going back and forth with me via email even though I was in a remote area with very little internet service. Thankfully everything turned out fine In short, you're in good hands staying at Marco's place.
Excellent stay at a comfortable apartment. Easy checkin and checkout. Very responsive and accommodating host.

Great flat in an awesome location in Palermo. Flat was perfect for 4 people. Check in couldn’t have been easier and any more hassle free even at midnight. Marcos was easy to deal with. Rooftop pool and gym were a great touch. Highly recommend.

Very comfortable apartment in a perfect location! The apartment is as pictured and Marcos is a great host. He even left us a bottle of wine which we enjoyed during our stay. There are plenty of restaurants and bars right outside your door, and even more in a short walking distance.

O apartamento é lindo, muito confortável, ótima localização, perto de restaurantes, mercados, bares... Excelente! O Marcos deu muitas dicas de passeios e restaurantes, respondeu todas as nossas dúvidas e sempre muito educado. Amamos a nossa viagem! Buenos Aires é muito lindo!!! Recomendo sem pensar!!!
Localização muito boa para quem gosta da noite , apto perfeito e muito aconchegante ! A 800 mts do metrô e 200mts das paradas de ônibus ! Recomendo ! O anfitrião foi muito prestativo !
Great location and an attentive host. Recommended

Nice modern apartment in nice building .
Good location in safe area . All is present in the apartment. 
There is some light noise from passing trains starting early morning.
We had a great stay. The apartment was clean and Marcos was very responsive. Would stay there again any day.

Great central location, really safe at night, close to 2 supermarkets and a variety of restaurants.  Great apartment, well set up to cook in but pretty easy to go out too!  Good facilities, security and a clean, modern nice place to stay.  Bed and pillows really comfortable!  Pretty quiet at night - would definitely stay again.

Having travelled to Buenos Aires 8 times, I have stayed in a number of hotels and rentals. Marcos' description and pictures were exactly what we got. He was quite thorough and continually checked in on us throughout our stay. He provided us great recommendations. The apartment was in a wonderful location enabling us to thoroughly enjoy the surrounding area. There is a great night life in this area. Marcos was a great host. I will definitely stay at his property again!

Literalmente foi "perfeito". Apartamento aconchegante e com todas as comodidades para o conforto da família. Cozinha muito bem equipada! O local é silencioso, mas com alguns momentos "barulhentos". No quarto de casal, à noite, muito ruído vindo do andar acima. Mas restrito ao período anterior às 0h.

As fotos da publicação não condizem com a realidade atual do apartamento. O apartamento precisa de manutenção e/ou reformas. O apartamento é muito bem localizado, perto dos mais badalados bares e restaurantes de Pallermo Hollywood. 
A assistência do anfitrião  foi excelente. Todas as dúvidas foram sanadas e fomos prontamente atendidos, quando precisávamos de algo. O check in não aconteceu no horário marcado, por conta de um atraso na limpeza do apartamento. Mas, conseguimos deixar as nossas malas no apartamento, e saímos para desfrutar da cidade.
reviews.response: Hola Ellen, o apartamento é exatamente como nas fotos. Nós só adicionamos cortinas de chuveiro adicionais à porta de vidro do chuveiro.

reviews.comments:
O apartamento é bem localizado, o bairro é ótimo e cheio de restaurantes, barzinhos e um Carrefour express na frente do prédio, além disso o metrô Palermo está a cerca de 5 ou 6 quadras à pé. Também muito próximo de um outlet, supermercado Dia e Mc Donald's e o Parque de la ciência (bom para crianças).
O apartamento é confortável e igual as fotos e acomoda bem 4 pessoas e os funcionários do prédio são super educados e prestativos. 
Alguns pontos a melhorar: a limpeza deixou a desejar, pois encontramos muita poeira debaixo das camas e sofá, chiclete mascado em um dos quartos, cabelos de hóspedes anteriores, maçaneta do quarto quebrada e o sistema de aquecimento que é proveniente do ar condicionado, porém é impossível ligar os 3 aparelhos juntos, pois a energia do apartamento é interrompida. Aliás o único ar condicionado que realmente aquece é o da sala e como pegamos noites com temperaturas de 2°C e 3° C isso fez toda a diferença!!!
A hospedagem foi OK, mas não retornaria a este apartamento.

Loved, loved, loved the apartment, the building and the neighborhood!  Felt right at home, helpful front desk staff, lots of good restaurants nearby, and Marcos was a great host.  Ask Marcos for his food recommendations - they were all spot on!  Would definitely stay here again.

Marcos foi um ótimo anfitrião e se preocupou conosco o tempo todo. Antes mesmo de alugar, fiz algumas perguntas que foram respondidas rapidamente. Acredito que possa melhorar na limpeza do apartamento,  que estava com muita poeira e cheiro de cigarro. Além disso, a máquina do ar condicionado que estava na varanda fazia muito barulho que podia ser ouvido dos quartos.
Casa muito boa! Bem localizado. Vale muito a pena. Melhor região de Buenos Aires! A casa tem tudo e o Marcos pensa em tudo. Pois não faltou nada.
Excelente apartamento. Localização top. Marcos muito atencioso.
Wonderful apartment in wonderful building in wonderful neighborhood, not to mention wonderful host.

Marcos is an amazing host who did a great job staying in contact with us and making sure we were ok. The apartment was great and had everything you need and was in a great location. I highly recommend this location for a trip to Buenos Aires.
Minha melhor experiência com airbnb! Recomendo muito.
What a clean, well-appointed condo!  Two adult couples had plenty of room and privacy.  Highly recommend Marcos' condo for your stay in Buenos Aires. Look no further, this was a steal!

Marcos's place was truly wonderful. First of all he communicates wonderfully, I asked for suggestions in the surrounding area and he provided me a very detailed, extensive, well thought out list. Check in was very easy and since our flight was early he let us check in/put our bags down early (no one was staying the night before, so that helped). But at the same time he was very respectful of our privacy. The security guards at the building were very nice too, upon check out they held our bags for us until we left the area (we were sure to tip them for their kindness). The apt is very walkable to nightlife, restaurants, and markets. We were 2 couples/4 people and found the apartment to be the perfect size and very clean. Great decor just as pictured. I really liked the balcony, a great place to sit and have a glass of Malbec. I would stay here again and plan on recommending it to my friends.
Excellent stay in a fantastic neighborhood.  We had a minor issue in the apartment and Marcos took care of it right away.  Would certainly stay in the apartment again.
We had an amazing experience at Marco's apartment. Wonderful place to stay with friends and perfect neighbourhood.

Four of us stayed here, and although the weather didn't cooperate, we had a great time. 
The place is smaller than it looks in the photos, but it was spotless, and had everything we needed. 
Marcos sent a list of recommendations for where to eat and drink that was a huge bonus. 
There is a little shop across the street for whatever you need. 
There are great eating and drinking options in very short walking distance, but I particularly liked Las Cabras   (cash only, 2 ATMs within walking distance)
Enjoy!
Muito legal. Perto de bons restaurantes e do Distrito Arcos. Seis quadras da estação de Metrô de Palermo.
Fabulous location near lots of restaurants and 5-6 blocks to a Subte station. Marcos was very attentive and easy to deal with.

Marcos' apartment was great in several ways: the location, perfect for food, drink, transit, and strolling. The apartment was well provisioned and comfortable, with every necessity available (including a drip coffee maker for an uncultured North American!). 

The rooftop pool was an added bonus that was well appreciated on hot summer days. 

Communication with Marcos was easy and quick, and always helpful. I would highly recommend anyone wanting a quiet apartment in a great, safe neighbourhood to book this place.
Appartement très agréable et confortable, sécurisé (concierge 24/24) et bien situé dans le beau quartier de Palermo. Nous recommandons ce logement sans hésitation.
Idéal pour 4 personnes

We had a great time in Marcos' place. Great location in Palermo, walking distance to lots of shops and restaurants. There is also a small supermarket across the street. 

Marcos was very helpful and gave us great recommendations on places to go for dinner and drinks. 

The apartment is clean and description on the site is accurate. Lots of light coming in through the big windows in the morning. 

However we had some issues during our stay with the appliances mainly. Hair dryer wasn't working properly, and the aircon started leaking on our last day. The pans and kitchen appliances are overused and should be replaced. Some door knobs and taps weren't fixed properly. We notified Marcos who assured it would be taken care of.

Overall this is a great place to stay, apparently dedicated to short term rental. We can only recommend it for your stay in BA.
reviews.response: Hi Alexandre, thanks for your feedback.  This apartment has received great reviews from all my other guests.  As I said in my review for this guest, he needs a lot of attention and handholding and he is more suitable for a 5 stay hotel, not Airbnb.

reviews.comments:
Très bel appartement , fidèle aux photos et bien situé, beaucoup de restaurants et bars à 2 pas.
Marcos est un hôte très à l'écoute et très hospitalier (nous avons été touchés du petit cadeau de bienvenue) 
Je recommande vivement ce logement 
Merci encore Marcos !
Clean comfortable stylish place close to everything. Marcos is quick to respond and attentive. Great place !

Marcos place was a very lovely ,well equipped apartment, clean and exactly as described. The rooftop pool with the amazing views was a bonus to relax in. Many great restaurants to choose from all within a few steps. Marcos was a fabulous host, very prompt in his replies to all of our needs and concerns. He welcomed us with a lovely Malbec to enjoy. It's been a wonderful stay and I would book his apartment again.

If you are coming to BA and want to stay in a wonderful apartment in a great location, this is the place for you.  Modern, clean and well-equipped, Marcos offers a great place for any traveler -- leisure or business!

Marcos is a great host, the apartment is very well located in Palermo Hollywood near cafes and restaurants. Marcos was very helpful, he gave us many recommendations and tips. He was also very responsive. Great place.

Nós adoramos nossa estadia no apartamento! O edifício é tranquilo e a piscina e sala de ginástica no topo do prédio têm uma vista de toda a cidade. O apartamento é exatamente como nas fotos, estava muito limpo quando chegamos e é bastante confortável! Há um pequeno carrefour express em frente, o que é muito prático! Em cada esquina há um restaurante ou bar, o que torna o bairro bem convidativo para bons passeios! Adoramos o Miranda, na esquina da rua Costa Rica com Frtiz Roy, que tem ambiente agradável e comida muito boa! Gostamos também de conhecer o Peron Peron, bar temático há poucos quarteirões do apartamento, divertido e comida boa! O Marcos foi muito simpático e atencioso! Havia uma garrafa de vinho para nos recepcionar! Os funcionários do prédio sempre simpáticos! Voltaremos com certeza!!

We loved our stay here. The location is perfect, near a lot of great restaurants, bars, and shopping, and the apartment itself is clean, well stocked, and comfortable. Marcos was very accommodating with an earlier check in and he shared a really helpful list of recommendations in the neighborhood.
Wonderful condo in a quiet building in a beautiful neighborhood!

Marcos was very helpful and actually came out immediately and fixed a couple minor issues during our stay. The apartment was immaculate and the location was superb.  Very smooth check in and check out, and Marcos gave us five pages of recommendations.  Highly recommend!!

Excellent location, security, access to groceries, restaurants, attractions, events...
Apartment is just as expected, great views, open and airy, comfortable and convenient.
Marcos is responsive, however never intrusive, just as necessary. Appreciated.
O apartamento é incrível! Perfeito para dois casais. Marcos foi sempre muito atencioso e deu ótimas dicas. A localização não podia ser melhor!

Marcos was great to communicate with from the start.  He provided all of the check in information and great recommendations on where to eat and drink.  He was very responsive and helpful throughout the stay as well.  I highly recommend staying at his place. The building location is awesome!  So close to everything.  The doormen were very nice and helpful as well.

Marcos was a fantastic host. Extremely accommodating and very responsive with all our requests. His recommendations for things to do and places to eat around Palermo were spot on - we felt like porteños.

I visited BA with 3 friends ans we stayed at Marcos appartment which was perfectly located in Palermo with all nice bars and restaurants around the corner. I would definately recomment the appartment, it was clean and had a lot of facilities. Marcos is a great host! We had a wonderful time!

The apartment was modern and clean. Wifi worked great. My wife and I stayed at the apartment with our daughter so we appreciated having two bedrooms and two full bathrooms. Then best feature was the location. We could walk to many restaurants, cafes and shops. We arrived early and left our luggage with the guard in the lobby.

Marcos did a great job in explaining everything and was very helpful. The handover went without any problems and it is very noticeable that Marcos is very experienced with Airbnb and with renting out his apartment. There's absolutely nothing to complain about!

It was a great facility....neighbourhood was great for restaurants...just that Palermo is a bigger area so when advertising suggest you mention the area within Palermo. The shops are quite a distance. To be fair that was our only disappointment as you needed taxis to take you to other places. Maybe a map of the area and recommended train/tube stations

Marcos place was very nice, everything was awesome, great introduction to Palermo district, safe building and clean apartment made for a pleasant stay, highly recommended and a tip from me is the handiness of a store across the road for milk and fruit etc.

Marcos is a very good host. The apartment is in a perfect location with some very nice restaurants located nearby. 
I only can recommend Marcos and his apartment!!

The apartment was perfect for me and my family, and convenient to shops, restaurants, and my company's office. Not only would we stay here again, but I'm passing the link around to all of my colleagues who visit our office in Buenos Aires!
Excellent place !

My husband and I rented this apartment from Marcos and stayed there with my parents for 4 nights.  Marcos was very helpful getting us checked in, and provided us with lots of recommendations for nearby restaurants and how to navigate the subway system.  

The apartment was exactly as listed, very clean and comfortable.  The bedrooms are large and it has two bathrooms, so very well suited for 4 guests.  We also enjoyed using the gym in the building with great views of the city.  Location was good, a short walk to many restaurants in Palermo Soho and to the subway.  There were also several grocery stores and produce markets very close by.  

I would definitely recommend Marco's apartment to others visiting Buenos Aires!

Great stay in a comfortable and well-furnished apartment in an excellent location. Marcos is a seasoned host who is ready to provide help and tips for travelers. My husband and I stayed with our 2 year old daughter and we were very comfortable.
Marcos was extremely responsive and provided all the support one needs to feel welcome and comfortable at home. I highly recommend it.
